contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} '''Baiti''' is a [[district]] in the [[Pacific]] nation of [[Nauru]]. It belongs to [[Ubenide Constituency]]. ==Former villages== [[File:NauruBaiti.png|thumb|200px|right|Baiti district shown within Nauru.]] {| cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" border="1" style="border: gray solid 1px; border-collapse: collapse;" !colspan="1" align=left bgcolor="#EFEFEF" width="120" | '''Former villages''' |- | [[Adrurior]] |- | [[Aeonun]] |- | [[Anakawida]] |- | [[Anut]] |- | [[Ataneu]] |- | [[Atirabu]] |- | [[Baiti (village)]] |- | [[Deradae]] |- | [[Ibedwe]] |- | [[Imangengen]] |- | [[Imaraga]] |- | [[Mangadab]] |- | [[Mereren]] |- | [[Umaruru]] |- | [[Yatabang]] |} ==Location and features== It is located in the northwest of the island. Baiti is a part of the [[constituency]] of [[Ubenide]]. ===Area=== The district of Balti covers an area of 1.2 kmÂ². ===Population=== The population is 810. ==See also== * [[Geography of Nauru]] * [[Districts of Nauru]] {{Districts of Nauru}} {{Coord|0|30|25|S|166|55|54|E|display=title}} [[Category:Districts of Nauru]] {{Nauru-geo-stub}}
